name: Traveler Leather Duffle
description:
Crafted from premium top-grain crazy horse leather, this handmade duffle bag embodies rugged elegance and timeless durability. It features a dedicated suit carrier, a detachable & djustable leather strap for versatile carrying and a spacious interior for effortless travel organization.

- Premium Full‑Grain “Crazy Horse” Leather.
- Dedicated Suit Carrier
- Water-Resistant, Rugged & Reliable.
- Perfect for Travel - Work & Leisure Trips.
productInfo:
Crafted from premium vegetable-tanned full-grain leather, this bag ages gracefully, developing a rich and distinctive patina over time. Ideal for 3–5 day business or leisure trips, it offers generous space and refined durability. A built-in trolley sleeve allows easy attachment to your luggage, ensuring effortless and seamless travel.

Features:
- Hand Crafted from premium top-grain leather
- Fitted with high-quality solid brass hardware
- Detachable and adjustable leather shoulder strap for versatile carrying
- Spacious main compartment with secure zip closure for clothing
- Four interior zippered pockets for organized storage of accessories
- Integrated suit carrier to conveniently hold up to two suits
- Exterior front open pocket for quick-access essentials
- Rear exterior zippered pocket for added security
- Durable YKK zippers throughout
- Interior lined with 100% cotton fabric
- Approximate dimensions: 23" (L) x 11" (H) x 11" (W)
- Color: Saddle Brown
careInfo: Care: To preserve the natural beauty of your leather, keep it away from prolonged moisture and direct sunlight. Clean with a soft, dry cloth. We recommend conditioning with a quality leather balm every 3–6 months depending on use.

name: Leather Apron
description:
Introducing the Leather Apron—carefully handcrafted from Crazy Horse full-grain leather, one of the finest natural leathers available. Designed for chefs, butchers, artisans, baristas, and BBQ enthusiasts, this apron delivers exceptional protection, rugged elegance, and long-lasting durability.

name: Leather Backpack (Unisex)
description:
Premium Crazy Horse full-grain leather backpack with hand-stitched rugged texture. Features dual zip compartments, padded laptop section, front buckle pocket, zipper pocket, and side bottle holders—compact yet spacious for work, travel, and everyday carry.

- Premium Full‑Grain “Crazy Horse” Leather.
- Two side pocket for water bottle cary.
- Perfect for Work, School/College, Travel and Everyday Carry.
productInfo:
Hand Crafted, Premium Crazy Horse full-grain leather backpack with hand-stitched rugged texture. Features dual zip compartments, padded laptop section, front buckle pocket, zipper pocket, and side bottle holders—compact yet spacious for work, travel, and everyday carry.

- Two main compartment with zipper closing.

name: Leather Convertible Shoulder Bag & Backpack
description:
Premium genuine leather shoulder bag handcrafted in Pakistan for modern women who value luxury and timeless style. This bag can be used as a backpack as well. Features a secure zip closure, spacious main compartment, inner pocket, and outer front zipper pocket—perfect for work, travel, and everyday elegance.

- Convertibe to Backpack
- Secure zip closure with spacious main compartment
- Inner zipper pocket for organized storage
- Outer front zipper pocket for quick access essentials
- Elegant, minimal design for work and daily wear.

name: Crossbody Bag (Unisex)
description:
Vintage A6 shoulder & crossbody bag crafted from premium Crazy Horse leather. Designed for e-reader, wallet, phone, and keys, it offers secure storage, water resistance, and all-day comfort. Develops a rich patina over time—perfect for travel, walks, and daily use.

- Premium Crazy Horse full-grain leather
- Compact A6 size for phone, wallet & e-reader
- Water-resistant with secure compartments
- Wide leather strap for comfortable carry
- Ideal for travel, city walks & everyday wear
productInfo:
Looking for a stylish yet practical solution for your everyday essentials? The practical vintage-look sling bag is just what you need. This sporty-elegant shoulder bag, crafted from high-quality Crazy Horse leather, combines classic elegance with modern functionality. Specifically designed for your e-reader, wallet, smartphone, and keys, it offers optimal storage space and protects your belongings in any weather thanks to its waterproof construction.

Over time, the bag develops a sophisticated patina that further emphasizes its vintage character and makes it increasingly valuable with age. Thanks to the handcrafted workmanship and sustainable genuine leather, you receive a durable product that perfectly complements your everyday life.

The well-designed interior layout ensures that you can always keep your belongings organized – making it the ideal messenger bag for walks, hikes, or sightseeing. Thanks to the wide shoulder straps made of the finest full-grain cowhide leather, you'll enjoy optimal carrying comfort and maximum freedom of movement.

Features:
- Premium Crazy Horse full-grain leather
- Compact A6 size for phone, wallet & e-reader
- Water-resistant with secure compartments
- Wide leather strap for comfortable carry
- Ideal for travel, city walks & everyday wear
- Clever, adjustable closure with roll buckle and snap closure
- 2 pen holders; inside
- 2 slip pockets (each 13 x 18 cm)
- 1 zippered pocket (12 x 10 cm) on the front
- 1 secret slip pocket (13 x 18 cm) on the front
- Adjustable, wide shoulder strap made of saddle leather on the back
- Lining: Combed cotton
- Sewing thread: Serafil Amann Germany
- Zipper: Opti Germany, YKK Japan
- Reinforced stress points with extra stitching and solid rivets
- Elegant metal fittings: double-headed rivets Solid roller buckles, eyelets
- Color: Saddle Brown
careInfo: Care: To preserve the natural beauty of your leather, keep it away from prolonged moisture and direct sunlight. Clean with a soft, dry cloth. We recommend conditioning with a quality leather balm every 3–6 months depending on use.

description:
